name: Wave Wand 3 Barrel Hair Waver 1u201d
about: What it is:A three-barrel wand that makes styling the effortless, frizz-free Aussie beach waves a breeze..Hair Type:Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Texture:Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Concerns:- Frizz.Key Benefits:- Easy to use.What Else You Need to Know:The tourmaline ceramic and ionic technology leave hair smooth, frizz-free, and evenly styled. The adjustable temperature setting is for any hair type and texture.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Appy Heat Protect Spray (sold separately). .-Turn on wave wand and select your desired temperature. .-Section hair and start on the base of the neck, working your way up to the top layers of hair. .-Clamp a small section of hair near the scalp (without touching). Hold for a few seconds, release, and move down the hair shaft to ends. .-Repeat until the full head is complete. .-Finish style with Sea Salt Texture Spray (sold separately)..-Pro tip: Alternate sections between the Wave Wand and a curling iron for a fun, textured look.

reviews.review_text: Can't rave about this enough and how easy it is to do my hair in the morning! Since I don't have much hair to begin with, the wave wand does my hair in 5 minutes. Would recommend for easy styling every day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Loved the look this hair waver gave me! I brought it to Vegas and it made me feel like a mermaid. It was a bit hard to use at first since it is larger than a curler but you get used to it
As a girl with thin hair iu2019m always looking for tools that help with volume. This waver gives me perfect subtle waves. It looks like I have cute beachy waves after using this wand!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I never usually write reviews but this tool has changed my hair game forever! I have long hair that is kind of thin and difficult to make look good/styled. In the past I've given up and just thrown it in a ponytail or bun and surrendered to the hair gods, forever doomed to be jealous of every stranger's hair. BUT NO LONGER! Behold texture, volume, and long lasting cute curls. It doesn't take too long, it looks natural, and I finally feel confident about my hair!  My only tip is when you start at the top don't hold it for too long (no more than 5 seconds) or it will make a weird bump at the top of your head. Just make the waves looser near the top to make it more natural.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVE this wand!!! Itu2019s so smooth on the hair and I love how it works well with my thick and long hair. I recommend to anyone who loves that wavy look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This item worked great, however, the spring on the handle broke after 10 months.  Pretty disappointed this didn't even last me (1) year.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This wand is easy to use, creates the perfect beach waves in short and long hair! Love it! Got compliments from friends and family on my hair! Before and after pics of my hair to see the difference in just 5 minutes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It does a really good job. The tool isnu2019t too heavy to hold but it is large so I find it hard to get certain angle. My only complaint is where the ON/OFF button is. I also click it while doing my hair. Constantly

reviews.review_title: Burns hair. On the cheap sideu2026
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m very surprised by all the 5 stars because this product BURNS hair, even on low heat and with heat protectoru2026 usually itu2019s from cheap productsu2026 donu2019t use near your scalp.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So much fun! I have used this twice so far and both times it has turned out super full and fun!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked it, absolutely loved the waves it created in my hair but after like 5 uses it just didnu2019t want to turn on anymore. Very disappointed ud83dude14 Good thing the tool wasnu2019t expensive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gives a nice beachy wave. My only issue is that the power/temp control buttons are located very close to where I hold the  iron, so accidentally turning it off or adjusting the temperature while using it was annoying.

reviews.review_title: I fell for the Instagram ads so you don't have to!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the idea of the waver, but even with using a quality Bumble and Bumble heat protection spray I smell burnt hair. Also, not sure if it's the waver or my hair, but the styling just doesn't stay waved for very long. I used this twice, but just am not satisfied with this product. Looks cute for a bit, but a lot of work for what I can achieve with my flat iron for a similar look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Ive only used this once so far, BUT SUPER EASY and quick to use. I could see it being easy to burn yourself so use that glove they give you! Also use heat protection on your hair, this thing gets HOT as heck

reviews.review_title: Damages hair even on low heat
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m confused by all the 5 star reviews because after using this product only twice in low heat, itu2019s damaged my hair (I have untreated hair) to the point I had to trim it off. I always use heat protection only ever experience this kind of damage from cheap tools. I should have known the price was too good to be true.

reviews.review_title: Excellent for a new hair do!

reviews.review_text: This BONDIBOOST Wave Wand (25mm) is amazing! It comes with a heat protectant glove. It creates amazing hair waves, for a beach wave or boho look! Use with a heat protectant spray.

reviews.review_text: I've been using this left and right, its so easy and simple to use. Ive been dying to find a waver that, leaves my hair shiny and doesn't tug or pull on my hair. This is the one! Such a great find for summer, definently a must have!

reviews.review_text: This wave wand waver has been one of my favorite hair tools as it is so easy and quick when your in a rush. Itu2019s lightweight compared to others i have tried and just overall amazing

reviews.review_text: I've been dying to purchase a waver like this and glad I found this one from Bondi Boost! It is so easy to use and it came with a heat protective glove. I use the 160 degrees setting for this hair and i'm in love! u2764ufe0f

reviews.review_text: I have heavily bleached hair. I did the whole olaplex routine and was very excited to use the waver. It burnt my hair. The after smell of using this waver was awful. Returning it :(

reviews.review_text: There are times when I get sick of the same look with my permed hair. Many times it's messy, frizzy, and the curls are not as bouncy as I would like them to be. With this 3 barrel tool, it gave me more uniform curls quicker than a single barrel. I have a lot of hair so using this cut my time in half. I also had control of the temperature. I could lower the temp for areas that needed less heat. This hair waver is my new go-to for when I need to refresh my curls instantly.

reviews.review_text: I've usually been all for straight or blow-out hair, but this gives me the perfect waves on second and third-day hair. It adds so much volume and frames my face perfectly

I have thick hair but wanted to try this wave wand to get some beachy waves and I couldnu2019t be happier! It gives me just the right amount of wave and stays all day! Also itu2019s super easy to use which was great for me. I highly recommend grabbing this to have beach waves all year round

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is THE TOOL for my girls with textured hair! I detangled my curls on day 3 hair and used this wand to redefine it. It helps to not completely fight my texture, stretching the curls and making it neat again. I am obsessed! *bonus points for adding in the heat protectant glove, it really comes in handy* :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently of tried out the BondiBoost Wave Wand 3 Barrel Hair Waver (25mm / 1u201d), and I must say, I am thoroughly impressed! This styling tool has completely transformed my hair game. One of the standout features of this waver is its versatility. With three barrels, I have the flexibility to create a variety of hairstyles. Whether I want loose beachy waves, defined curls, or voluminous waves, the Wave Wand delivers every time. The 25mm / 1u201d barrel size is perfect for achieving natural-looking waves that hold their shape throughout the day.  Another aspect that sets the BondiBoost Wave Wand apart is its user-friendly design. The ergonomic handle ensures a comfortable grip, allowing me to style my hair effortlessly. The temperature control feature is a game-changer, allowing me to adjust the heat settings based on my hair type and desired look.  Additionally, I must commend BondiBoost for their commitment to using clean and high-quality ingredients. The Wave Wand is infused with nourishing ingredients that help protect and strengthen my hair, which is an added bonus.  In conclusion, the BondiBoost Wave Wand 3 Barrel Hair Waver (25mm / 1u201d) is a must-have styling tool for anyone who wants to achieve gorgeous, salon-quality waves. Its outstanding performance, versatility, and thoughtful design make it a standout product in the market. I highly recommend it to anyone looking to elevate their hairstyling routine. Trust me, you won't be disappointed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love my Bondi Boost Wave Wand 3 Barrel Hair Waver (25mm / 1u201d). As someone who is always looking for a new hairstyle to complete an outfit, this waver does the perfect job! It heats up so quickly and is able to produce those effortless beach waves everyone strives for. The three-barrel design allows for the hair to be styled in larger sections. This waver leaves your hair with so much smoothness and shine. This high-quality product definitely gives the best results, Iu2019m in love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy using this tool. Heats up pretty fast. Be aware that the temperature shows up in Celsius instead of Fahrenheit, which I didnu2019t like because Iu2019m not used to it. Other than that, itu2019s pretty easy to use. The waves come out perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Crimped hair is coming back!! I absolute love this tool and the look is stunning. It heats up super fast and really easy to use. I specifically like this beach waver because the spring is really good so you donu2019t have to use a lot of pressure and press down each time you wave your hair. This works on all hair lengths and looks amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this waver. Not only was it super easy to use but it made my hair look flawless! I have to be careful with the heat that goes on my hair with having extensions and this product worked so amazingly! I highly recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! This tool gives you the perfect beach waves and it holds all day! Just add a little bit of your favorite hairspray!

reviews.review_text: This hair waver is so easy to use, especially if you aren't great at styling hair. This waver does exactly what it says- easy to use, long lasting, leaves hair smooth and frizz-free! It's such a fun and pretty way to style aside from regular curls or straight hair.

reviews.review_title: Best add on to my GRWM routine!

reviews.review_text: I was very picky which hair waver to use since I love my hair so much! I couldnu2019t find the best one until I tried this Wave Wand (25mm) from Bondi boost! I got alot of compliments from my girlies when we go out! Must try! Quality is amazing and I love the control button options! Heating up hair could be tricky and risky! Take care of your hair with Quality products from Bondi Boost girlies!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love!! Heats up quickly, and itu2019s fast to style my hair with this (i have super long hip length hair!), takes me about 15 mins to do my whole head. The metal is super smooth and doesnu2019t snag or pull hair at all. This is the best wave tool iu2019ve tried, and the style lasts for days! 100% recommend Bondi Boost Waver over any other waver!

reviews.review_text: This product is AMAZING! It heats up quickly and is super easy to use! I get the cutest beach waves in just minutes. I have never used a better hair tool!! 11/10 recommended!!

reviews.review_text: This is my new go-to hair tool! It is so easy to use and gives you that perfect beachy look! I definitely recommend this waver!

reviews.review_text: If you are looking for the perfect beach waves , this is a MUST have! I used sea salad spray and the waves did not fall out of my hair! Itu2019s the perfect effortless look!

reviews.review_text: This is the best hair crimper ever! It gives beautiful beach waves. It is so easy to use, and heats up very quickly! The tool has a little u201cscreenu201d type thing on the handle that shows when itu2019s on and off, and the heat! THE BARREL IS ALSO SPARKLEY!!
Love this product! Perfect beach waves and super easy to use

This is a must have hair tool! Who doesnu2019t want beach waves any day! This tool is super stylish and easy to use! I am new to a beach waver tool and this is beyond good! My hair came out great and I canu2019t wait to use this everyday for my hair style!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely loved this product. It gives me such a good beachy wave and doesnu2019t take terribly long either! Itu2019s so easy to use and doesnu2019t leave my hair feeling dry and dull. It comes with a heat protectant glove which i love!

I recently have gotten and tried out the wave wand and loved it. At first I was nervous because it looked heavy. But honestly it was not that bad hold. I have shoulder length hair so it really didnu2019t take me too long. I held it down for 10 seconds and a perfect wave was given after a few trials . Honestly anyone can do it itu2019s so easy and looks more natural than a normal curler. After I finished I brushed through the wavers to make it more natural. It held throughout the day and would recommend it if you want more of a beachier look. Even throwing in some sea salt spray and scrunching it would be chefs kiss.
